allow: Bash(D:MultiTaskbackendvenvScriptspython.exe manage.py shell -c "from tasks.models import Category; cats = Category.objects.all\(\); print\(''\\n''.join\([f''{c.id}: {c.slug} - {c.name}'' for c in cats]\)\)")

Bash(D:MultiTaskbackendvenvScriptspython.exe manage.py shell -c "from payments.models import Escrow; from tasks.models import Task; task = Task.objects.get\(id=1242\); print\(''Task:'', task.id, ''Status:'', task.status, ''Payment:'', task.payment_status\); escrows = Escrow.objects.filter\(task=task\); print\(''Escrows:'', escrows.count\(\)\); [print\(''  -'', e.escrow_id, e.status, e.total_amount\) for e in escrows]")

Bash(powershell.exe -Command "Get-ChildItem D:\\MultiTask -Filter ''nul'' -Recurse | Select-Object -ExpandProperty FullName; Get-ChildItem D:\\MultiTask\\backend -Filter ''find_users.py'' | Select-Object -ExpandProperty FullName")

Bash(powershell.exe -Command "
# Remove unnecessary progress/status markdown files \(keep README.md and DOCUMENTATION.md\)
$filesToRemove = @\(
    ''D:\\MultiTask\\COMPLETE_IMPLEMENTATION_SUMMARY.md'',
    ''D:\\MultiTask\\IMPROVEMENTS_IMPLEMENTED.md'',
    ''D:\\MultiTask\\IMPROVEMENTS_PROGRESS.md'',
    ''D:\\MultiTask\\MENNA_ALLAH_ACCOUNT_UPDATE.md'',
    ''D:\\MultiTask\\NOTIFICATION_FIXES.md'',
    ''D:\\MultiTask\\ONBOARDING_SETUP.md'',
    ''D:\\MultiTask\\PAYMENT_DEBUGGING_FIXED.md'',
    ''D:\\MultiTask\\PAYMENT_FIXES_SUMMARY.md'',
    ''D:\\MultiTask\\PAYMENT_SYSTEM_READY_TO_TEST.md'',
    ''D:\\MultiTask\\PAYMENT_SYSTEM_REPORT.md'',
    ''D:\\MultiTask\\PAYMENT_SYSTEM_STATUS.md'',
    ''D:\\MultiTask\\PAYMENT_TESTING_GUIDE.md'',
    ''D:\\MultiTask\\PAYMENT_WORKFLOW_FIXED.md'',
    ''D:\\MultiTask\\PHASE2_PROGRESS.md'',
    ''D:\\MultiTask\\PROFILE_PAGE_IMPROVEMENTS.md'',
    ''D:\\MultiTask\\PROJECT_DOCUMENTATION.md'',
    ''D:\\MultiTask\\SKILL_FILTERING_IMPLEMENTATION.md'',
    ''D:\\MultiTask\\UI_IMPROVEMENTS_SUMMARY.md'',
    ''D:\\MultiTask\\backend\\find_users.py''
\)
foreach \($file in $filesToRemove\) {
    if \(Test-Path $file\) {
        Remove-Item $file -Force
        Write-Host ""Removed: $file""
    }
}
")

Bash(powershell.exe -Command "Remove-Item ''D:\\MultiTask\\COMPLETE_IMPLEMENTATION_SUMMARY.md'' -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Remove-Item ''D:\\MultiTask\\IMPROVEMENTS_IMPLEMENTED.md'' -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Remove-Item ''D:\\MultiTask\\IMPROVEMENTS_PROGRESS.md'' -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Remove-Item ''D:\\MultiTask\\MENNA_ALLAH_ACCOUNT_UPDATE.md'' -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Remove-Item ''D:\\MultiTask\\NOTIFICATION_FIXES.md'' -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Remove-Item ''D:\\MultiTask\\ONBOARDING_SETUP.md'' -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue")

Bash(powershell.exe -Command "Remove-Item ''D:\\MultiTask\\PAYMENT_DEBUGGING_FIXED.md'' -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Remove-Item ''D:\\MultiTask\\PAYMENT_FIXES_SUMMARY.md'' -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Remove-Item ''D:\\MultiTask\\PAYMENT_SYSTEM_READY_TO_TEST.md'' -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Remove-Item ''D:\\MultiTask\\PAYMENT_SYSTEM_REPORT.md'' -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Remove-Item ''D:\\MultiTask\\PAYMENT_SYSTEM_STATUS.md'' -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Remove-Item ''D:\\MultiTask\\PAYMENT_TESTING_GUIDE.md'' -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue")

Bash(powershell.exe -Command "Remove-Item ''D:\\MultiTask\\PAYMENT_WORKFLOW_FIXED.md'' -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Remove-Item ''D:\\MultiTask\\PHASE2_PROGRESS.md'' -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Remove-Item ''D:\\MultiTask\\PROFILE_PAGE_IMPROVEMENTS.md'' -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Remove-Item ''D:\\MultiTask\\PROJECT_DOCUMENTATION.md'' -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Remove-Item ''D:\\MultiTask\\SKILL_FILTERING_IMPLEMENTATION.md'' -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Remove-Item ''D:\\MultiTask\\UI_IMPROVEMENTS_SUMMARY.md'' -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Remove-Item ''D:\\MultiTask\\backend\\find_users.py'' -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue")

Bash(powershell.exe -Command "Remove-Item ''D:\\MultiTask\\nul'' -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Remove-Item ''D:\\MultiTask\\frontend\\nul'' -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Remove-Item ''D:\\MultiTask\\backend\\nul'' -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Remove-Item ''D:\\MultiTask\\.claude\\nul'' -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Get-ChildItem ''D:\\MultiTask\\backend'' -Filter ''nul'' -Recurse -File | Where-Object { $_.FullName -notlike ''*venv*'' } | Remove-Item -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Get-ChildItem ''D:\\MultiTask\\frontend'' -Filter ''nul'' -Recurse -File | Where-Object { $_.FullName -notlike ''*node_modules*'' } | Remove-Item -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Write-Host ''Cleanup completed''")
